Articles.Content:
I might be doing something horribly wrong, but I can not figure out how to zoom in the ASB in 0.90.0.705. I thought it was shift + scroll or arrow keys, but this does not seem to be working. Can someone please tell me how to "zoom" when working on something in the VAB?

Running Max OSX 10.9.5, unmodded.

Thanks,

Applemush.
Try the +/- keys, or if you have an external mouse, middle-click + forward/backward.
